message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the role of bees in pollination. Bees are known to be pollinators, and they play a crucial role in the reproduction of flowering plants such as roses. Option (A) is incorrect because bees do not provide a valuable service to houses. Option (B) and (C) are unrelated to the relationship between bees and plants.

The other options (A) house, (B) rock, and (C) water do not need pollination and are not directly related to the role of bees.
